nodes.text: The Atrium was a public building located in Ord Mynock Freeport, the only spaceport on the Outer Rim Territories planet Ord Mynock. It was designed to appeal to tourists, travellers, and citizens. A reinforced triangular glass enclosure, the Atrium had displays of Ord Mynock's fauna and flora. The Atrium also included displays of non-native creatures, including hover beaks from Rynmar, a red-crested aviar swooper from Entralla, cappabellor beetles from Malador, and rodents and cloud flies from Tatooine.
The Atrium was introduced in Gamemaster Toolkit: Live-Action Adventures, a West End Games sourcebook written by Anthony Russo and published in 1996.
